item.title: 美国优先 "将把我们引向何方？历史的答案：一无所获
item.description:
特朗普的经济民族主义与导致两次世界大战和全球专制政权崛起的政策如出一辙。【原文：

Trump’s brand of economic nationalism echoes policies that led to two world wars and the rise of authoritarian regimes across the globe.

】

item.title: 人工智能政治即将爆发
item.description:
准备好让数据中心主导大选吧。【原文：

Get ready for datacenters to dominate the election.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：人工智能政治即将爆发（播客）
item.description: 人工智能在 2024 年的大选中并不是什么热门话题。但在 2028 年，甚至是 2026 年的中期选举中，人工智能几乎肯定会成为一个大话题。人们担心所有的钱都花在了刀刃上，担心是否有一天需要联邦的支持或救助。人们担心能源使用和电价。还有对劳动力转移的担忧。还有人担心我们是否可以信任人工智能的产出。我们已经看到许多政客以这样或那样的方式反对人工智能。【原文：AI wasn’t much of a topic in the 2024 election. But it will almost certainly be big in 2028, and probably even the 2026 midterms. There are concerns about all the money being spent and whether a federal backstop or bailout will be necessary one day. There are the concerns about energy use and electricity prices. There are concerns about labor displacement. And there are concerns about whether we can trust AI outputs. Already we see numerous politicians lining up against AI in one way or another.】

item.title: 荷兰交还中资芯片制造商 Nexperia 的控制权
item.description: 荷兰政府暂停了对芯片制造商 Nexperia 的控制权，将其控制权交还给了该公司的中国所有者，从而化解了与中国政府的对峙，这种对峙已开始阻碍全球的汽车生产。【原文：The Dutch government suspended its powers over chipmaker Nexperia, restoring control to its Chinese owner and defusing a standoff with Beijing that had begun to hamper automotive production around the world.】

item.title: 韦丹塔计划增加在沙特的投资，推动铜矿和金矿的开采
item.description: 韦丹塔有限公司（Vedanta Ltd.）正计划加大在沙特阿拉伯的投资，这家印度企业集团押注于沙特阿拉伯在大规模经济转型中成为金属和采矿中心的雄心壮志。【原文：Vedanta Ltd. is planning to boost investments in Saudi Arabia as the Indian conglomerate bets on the kingdom’s ambitions to become a metals and mining hub as part of its massive economic transformation.】

item.title: 冰岛出人意料地将主要利率降至 7.25%，经济增长放缓
item.description: 冰岛央行出人意料地将借贷成本降至两年多来的最低水平，因为官员们释放出的信号是，在经济萎缩的同时，对这个大西洋国家通货膨胀的担忧有所减轻。【原文：Iceland’s central bank unexpectedly cut borrowing costs to the lowest level in more than two years as officials signaled reduced concerns over inflation in the Atlantic nation while the economy is contracting.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Verition 在市场艰难之年增聘能源交易员
item.description: 对冲基金 Verition 基金管理公司正在能源领域招聘人才，在许多交易员努力赚钱的这一年，该公司一反常态。【原文：Hedge fund Verition Fund Management is hiring in energy, going against the grain in a year when many traders have struggled to make money.】

item.title: 英国预算案临近，交易员正准备应对英镑波动
item.description: 在英国秋季财政预算案公布之前，交易员们正在为防止英镑波动而支付高昂的费用。【原文：Traders are paying up for protection against swings in the pound leading into the UK Autumn Budget.】

item.title: 中国锂市场反弹引发对其是否有发展前景的警惕
item.description: 由于需求乐观，中国的锂价连续第三天攀升，尽管大幅走高引发了对涨势持续性的担忧。【原文：Lithium prices in China climbed for a third day on demand optimism, although the sharp move higher has raised concerns about the sustainability of the rally.】

item.title: 南非通胀在预期降息前夕加快
item.description: 在普遍预期的降息前夕，南非的年度通胀率加速上升。【原文：South African annual inflation accelerated on the eve of a widely expected interest-rate cut.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚达纳塔拉公司向银行申请 10 亿美元信贷额度
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印尼主权财富基金达纳塔拉公司（Danantara）在向银行申请多达 100 亿美元的贷款几个月后，已申请到相当于 10 亿美元的多币种银团信贷。【原文：Indonesian sovereign wealth fund Danantara has lined up a multi-currency syndicated credit facility equivalent to $1 billion, according to people familiar with the matter, months after having approached banks for as much as $10 billion.】

item.title: 租金上涨提升英国置地英国办公楼和商店价值
item.description: 英国置地公司（British Land Co.【原文：British Land Co., reported a 1.2% rise in the value of its UK property portfolio as the landlord was boosted by rising rents after years of anemic development.】

item.title: 印尼盾落后于亚洲同行，印尼央行再次维持利率不变
item.description: 印尼央行连续第二个月维持基准利率不变，此举可能会为印尼盾提供支撑，印尼盾是今年亚洲表现最差的货币。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank left its benchmark interest rate unchanged for a second straight month in a move that may provide support for the rupiah, the worst-performing currency this year in Asia.】

item.title: 比特币下滑引发贝莱德 IBIT 提款创纪录
item.description: 投资者从贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：Investors pulled more than half a billion dollars from BlackRock Inc.’s iShares Bitcoin Trust, the largest single-day outflow since the fund’s debut, and the latest blow to a digital-assets market already short on confidence.】

item.title: WH Smith 首席执行官考林在会计差错调查后辞职
item.description: WH Smith Plc 首席执行官卡尔-考林（Carl Cowling）辞职，因为这家英国零售商称，迫使其削减北美地区利润前景的会计错误比预期的要严重。【原文：WH Smith Plc’s Chief Executive Officer Carl Cowling resigned, as the British retailer said an accounting error that forced it to slash its profit outlook in North America was larger than expected.】

item.title: 南苏丹称袭击后石油出口恢复正常
item.description: 南苏丹表示，在邻国苏丹的能源设施遭到袭击，石油运输活动中断后，该国已恢复石油运输。【原文：South Sudan said it had resumed oil shipments after attacks on energy facilities in neighboring Sudan disrupted activity.】

item.title: 法航荷航是葡萄牙国家航空（TAP）股权的首个已知竞购者
item.description: 法航荷航（Air France-KLM）是第一家宣布对葡萄牙 TAP SA 航空公司提交意向书的竞争者，这拉开了多阶段竞购的序幕，中标者将拥有这家国有航空公司多达 44.9% 的股份。【原文：Air France-KLM is the first contender to announce that it has lodged an expression of interest in Portugal’s TAP SA, kicking off a multi-stage process that will see the winning bidder own as much as a 44.9% stake in the state-owned carrier.】

item.title: 台湾问题持续发酵，中国暂停日本电影新片上映
item.description: 中国已经冻结了对日本新电影的监管审查，这使得台湾争端的后果更加严重，而台湾争端几乎没有缓和的迹象。【原文：China has frozen regulatory reviews for new Japanese films, adding to the fallout from a dispute over Taiwan that shows little sign of easing.】

item.title: 里夫斯预算案公布前，英国通胀率出现三月以来首次下降
item.description: 英国通胀率七个月来首次下降，这表明在英格兰银行和财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯做出关键决定之前，物价压力已过高峰期。【原文：UK inflation fell for the first time in seven months, a sign price pressures are past their peak ahead of crucial decisions by the Bank of England and Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves.】

item.title: S.韩国财政部长承诺采取行动稳定外汇和债券市场
item.description: 韩国财政部长表示，政府已准备好在必要时采取行动稳定韩元和债券市场，而与韩国明年被纳入全球主要指数相关的预期资本流入将进一步支撑市场。【原文：South Korea’s finance minister said the government is ready to act if needed to stabilize the won and bond markets, and the expected capital inflows tied to the nation’s inclusion in a major global index next year will further support markets.】

item.title: 韩国反垄断监管机构检查 Arm 公司首尔办事处
item.description: 韩国反垄断监管机构本周访问了 Arm Holdings Plc 的首尔办事处，熟悉内情的人士称，这是对该公司许可行为持续审查的一部分。【原文：South Korea’s antitrust regulator visited the Seoul offices of Arm Holdings Plc this week as part of ongoing scrutiny of the company’s licensing practices, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 英国通胀率降至 3.6
淡马锡称美元贬值令部分交易更难以自圆其说
item.description: 新加坡国家投资者淡马锡控股公司（Temasek Holdings Pte.【原文：Singapore state investor Temasek Holdings Pte. has been “forced to hedge” the US dollar this year, according to its chief executive officer, calling the greenback’s weakness a big issue for foreign investors.】

item.title: IH 称，津巴布韦的美元股票市场将在两年内超越百年历史的证券交易所
item.description: 在货币危机中于 2020 年成立的津巴布韦纯美元证券交易所，正在迅速取代拥有 131 年历史的主交易所作为南部非洲国家主要交易平台的地位。【原文：Zimbabwe’s dollar-only stock exchange, created in 2020 amid a currency crisis, is fast closing in on the 131-year-old main bourse’s mantle as the southern African nation’s main trading platform.】

item.title: 德意志银行将为奥约 3.5 亿美元贷款提供再融资
item.description: 据知情人士透露，德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）已经为瑞穗银行（Mizuho Bank Ltd.）最初提供的 3.5 亿美元贷款中的一部分进行了再融资，这笔贷款用于资助 Oyo Hotels 创始人 Ritesh Agarwal 购买该公司的股份。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG has refinanced part of a $350 million loan originally extended by Mizuho Bank Ltd. to fund Oyo Hotels founder Ritesh Agarwal’s purchase of shares in the company, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 戴蒙蟑螂住在风险市场的脑袋里
item.description:
许多投资者现在认为，私人信贷已经糟糕到需要 "灭虫 "的地步。【原文：

Many investors now believe that private credit is bad enough to need an exterminator.

】

item.title: 欧洲磁铁制造商警告不采取行动将面临稀土危机
item.description: 一家刚刚在美国建厂的德国磁铁制造商表示，欧洲需要采取更加果断的行动，减少对中国稀土的依赖，以避免更严重的供应中断。【原文：Europe needs to take much more decisive action to slash reliance on Chinese rare earths to avert worse supply disruptions, according to a German magnet maker that’s just started a plant in the US.】

item.title: 英伟达财报遭遇市场对人工智能支出的突然恐惧
item.description: 周三收盘后，英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）将发布财报，届时华尔街将了解用于人工智能的数十亿美元的去向。至于不断下挫的股市会作何反应，则是另一个问题。【原文：Wall Street will get a sense of where the billions of dollars being spent on artificial intelligence are going when Nvidia Corp. reports its earnings after the bell on Wednesday. How the sinking stock market will react is another question.】

item.title: Algebris 首席执行官警告大型人工智能股票将出现 "重大 "调整
item.description: Algebris 投资公司的创始人兼首席执行官警告投资者减少对全球顶级科技公司的投资，同时对人工智能持看跌态度。【原文：Algebris Investments’ founder and chief executive officer warned investors to reduce allocation to the world’s top technology companies as he made a bearish case for AI.】

item.title: 民调显示瑞士将拒绝对超级富豪征收遗产税
item.description: 在本月晚些时候举行全民公决之前进行的一项民意调查显示，四分之三的瑞士选民预计将拒绝针对超级富豪征收新的遗产税。【原文：Three quarters of Swiss voters are expected to reject a new inheritance tax targeted at the super rich, according to a poll ahead of a plebiscite later this month.】
